name: BouncyGuy
description:
BouncyGuy is a game where you are just bouncing all over the place breaking boxes and making yourself to the end of the level.  YOU ARE FREE TO BOUNCE!!! is the leitmotiv. Currently the game is in development, adding new features and mechanics so this is a demo you can enjoy.

BouncyGuy was entirely made by me (ArgoGames) on unity, creating the visuals, recording all soundtracks and sound effects and putting it all together.

I am happy to share and recibe constructive feedback!
